General.Name: KB Autosys Co. Ltd
General.Description: KB Autosys Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells brake pads and linings for the automobile industry in South Korea and internationally. It offers front/rear brake pads, drum brake linings, and shoe assembly products. The company was formerly known as Korea Beral Co., Ltd. and changed its name to KB Autosys Co., Ltd. in January 2010. KB Autosys Co., Ltd. was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Asan, South Korea.
